author: Andreas
content: Thanks for your optimism. As I just pointed out in a comment on Paul Maxim's blog, I'm reading Goldhagen's "Hitler's willing executioners" at the moment. There are so many parallels between German antisemitism and today's populist witch hunts, it is absolutely scary, and when I look at the long history of antisemitism in general and of this behavior of bashing on minorities, I see little hope that a few hundred years would be enough ðŸ™‚
